tm-fx

forex made simple

Full Rules and Guidelines

Placing Trades

  • No minimum number of trades, however 2 months of inactivity will see the account closed
  • You can place trades on 28 different major currency pairs
  • Instruments like crypto, gold, indices etc are also available

Risk

  • You can only risk up to 1.5% of the account balance on a trade.
  • The max exposure can be placed in just one trade, or spread out over many trades. For example, on the evaluation account, you could place 1 trade of 0.65 lots, or 13 trades of 0.05 lots. 13 x 0.05 = 0.65.
  • Every trade must have a stoploss in place.
  • If you exceed these limits your account will be frozen.

Receiving Your Earnings

  • You will be paid the net profits from the evaluation account upon its completion
  • Profits from all higher levels will be paid in the first week of the new month
  • Profits paid to you will not be deducted from the profit accumulation toward the next milestone

Restrictions

  • Violations of the following restrictions will result in account termination
  • You are not permitted to use any kind of copy trading service
  • No one else is permitted to use your account other than you
  • You are not permitted to have more than one account

The Evaluation Period

  • You have 1 year to complete the evaluation period
  • If you hit the evaluation target early, you will you wil still have to continue to trade until you hit the 30 minimum trading days
  • If you exceed the profit target on the evaluation period, you will still only receieve 40% of the target, and not the excess

Receiving Your Account Details

  • You will typically receive your login details within a few hours after signing up, however allow up to 24 hours
  • If you sign up on a Saturday or Sunday, please allow until Monday
  • If you sign up on a Friday, you could receive your details the same day depending on the time, however if it's outside of our office hours, then also allow until Monday
  • You can login on either mobile or PC

Drawdown

  • The max drawdown at any level is 4%
  • Accounts are automatically closed when the mx drawdown is hit

Permissibles

  • You are allowed to use any trading strategy or style
  • You are allowed to leave trades running overnight and over the weekend
  • You are allowed to hedge
  • EA's are allowed
